name: Tactile Toy Factory
description:
Tactile Toy Factory is a completed game project from November 2021, marking my 2nd completed game so far with the Unity Engine. The project was completed when I was attending Technology, Engineering, and Career Center - East in my senior year of high school (2021-2022). The project was designed for Game Design I, where the goal of the project was to make a kindergarten edutainment game. Tactile Toy Factory was voted best edutainment game by fellow peers taking Game Design I.

Tactile Toy Factory by Xander Corcoran has the player take the role of a toy factory working, sorting and coloring toys of different shapes. Included in the game are a list of Texas Essential Knowledge and Skills (or TEKS) that the game teaches. Among teaching kindergarteners 3D shapes, the game also teaches the young audience colors and paint color mixing up to tertiary colors.
